privates.name: Christ Church Engineering
privates.description: Retire this company as part of an Upgrade Track action to replace a basic city tile with a major city tile of the next level.

privates.name: Scott Engineering
privates.description: Retire this company as part of an Upgrade Track action to replace a basic city tile with a major city tile of the next level.

privates.name: Ironstone Mining Company
privates.description: When acquired, place the Mine token on a basic city to which you can trace a route. The city with the Mine token is worth an additional £10 for your trains.

privates.name: Chester Village
privates.description: When acquired, gain the Chester Village token. When upgrading a hex that contains a town, you may place the Chester Village token on a vacant track segment on that hex. Chester Village counts as a town with value £10/20/30. When your trains may visit Chester Village without it counting as a stop.

privates.name: Royal Mail Contracting
privates.description: After Running Trains, pay your treasury £10 for each off-board area and county visited by your trains this turn. (Each counts only once, even if visited multiple times. A county is visited if a route visits a town or city within it, as denoted by the background colour of the hex.)

privates.name: Swinford Toll Bridge
privates.description: Retire this company to receive a discount of £40 when you next build a bridge or drain a marsh this turn.

privates.name: Horspath Engineering
privates.description: Retire this company to receive a discount of £40 when you next build a cutting this turn.

privates.name: Sonning Engineering
privates.description: Retire this company to receive a discount of £40 when you next build a cutting this turn.

privates.name: Park End Construction
privates.description: Retire this company to receive a discount of £40 when you next place a station token this turn.

privates.name: Brunel Engineering
privates.description: Retire this company to take an additional Build Track action this round. (This may be before or after any other build actions.)

privates.name: Cowley Engineering
privates.description: Retire this company to take an additional Upgrade Track action this round. (This may be before or after any other build actions.)

privates.name: Beeching Accountancy
privates.description: Retire this company to remove a town from a track segment to which you can trace a route to the town. You may not select the home town of a Minor Railway nor the Chester Village token.

notes.note: No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
